main event: A 12-year-old girl reported being burned by ray guns from a flying saucer with green men while on schoolyard recess.
interesting points: The sighting occurred during noon recess on 28 April 1964,The girl claimed to have seen green men in the flying saucer,She experienced burns two days later, which were attributed to conjunctivitis instead of the UFO incident,The sighting followed the notable Socorro incident, leading to speculation about its authenticity.
